Title: La teta y la luna
Writer: Josep Bargalló (additional dialogue), Cuca Canals, Frédéric Lasaygues (additional dialogue), Bigas Luna
Actors: Biel Duran, Mathilda May, Gérard Darmon, Miguel Poveda
Plot: A child cannot stand the idea of having a new brother and dreams about drinking milk from the breasts of his mother again. The child asks the moon to bring him a teet only for him.
